data.title: Beyond Time
data.chinese: Guāng Yīn Zhī Wài 光阴之外
data.description: Xu Qing’s world sank into deathly silence after the descendence of “God”. Master cultivators brought the human race and escaped the continent, and the remaining people struggled to survive. Every place that was met by “God’s” gaze had nearly all life forms wiped out.

data.title: The Sacred Ruins
data.description: To rise from defeat; to revive amidst the dissipation. As the vast oceans turn to dust and the thunder and lightning fade away, That strand of spiritual mist once again approaches our great world. With the shackles that bound our world now severed—A whole new world of mystery and wonder awaits

data.title: Sword Of Coming Season 2
data.chinese: Jian Lai 剑来 第2季
data.description: Chen Ping'an had grown up his entire life in a mundane little town, leading an impoverished yet peaceful existence. However, the arrival of a group of outsiders quickly turned his mundane life on its head. Before long, all types of strange occurrences were taking place in the town.

data.title: The Daily Life Of Immortal King Season 5
data.chinese: Xian Wang de Ri Chang 仙王的日常生活第五季
data.description: At the heart of Season 5 is the arrival of Wang Nuan, Wang Ling’s little sister. She’s not just adorable—she’s incredibly powerful, perhaps even too powerful for her own good. As Wang Ling says in the novel: I never wanted to be a teacher.

data.title: A Will Eternal Season 4
data.chinese: Yi Nian Yong Heng 一念永恒 第四季
data.description: One will to create oceans. One will to summon the mulberry fields. One will to slaughter countless devils. One will to eradicate innumerable immortals. Only my will… is eternal. A Will Eternal tells the tale of Bai Xiaochun.

data.title: Spirit Realm Walker
data.chinese: Ling Jing Xing Zhe 灵境行者
data.description: Since ancient times, it was rumored that there was a Spirit Realm.

data.title: Island Of Siliang Season 3
data.chinese: Juan Siliang 眷思量 第三季
data.description: This is a story of conspiracy and redemption set on the magnificent and fantastical Island of Siliang. It begins with the protagonist, Jingxuan, investigating the truth behind his parents' deaths.
